title: Bootstrap List Groups
subject: Bootstrap
theory:
## Complex Lists
List groups are flexible components for displaying a series of content.

### Basic Styling
* `ul.list-group`
* `li.list-group-item`

### Modifiers
* `.active`: Highlights item.
* `.disabled`: Grays out item.
* `.list-group-flush`: Removes outer borders (perfect for inside Cards).
